QuestData.Title: Graduation Speech
QuestData.Description: You're finally ready, $ndamus.$B$BI am so proud of you and all you've accomplished.$B$BToday you will deliver a speech in front of your peers and inspire them to crush our enemies until Hyjal is nothing but a pile of ash.$B$BRemember, $ndamus. It'll be important to read your audience's emotions and use words that best address those emotions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Initiation Podium at Doom's Vigil to successfully deliver the Graduation Speech.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you come to finish me off?$B$BNo... you appear to be... sane.
QuestData.RewardText: You. You're clearly not with them.$B$BAn ally then?
